messages.message:
@Aaron Tami My requests to Form Recogniser container (invoice model) is getting timed out frequently. Below is the `endpoint` & the stack trace

ENP_POINT = `http://service-form-recognizer-invoice.instabase-dogfood.svc.cluster.local:5093/formrecognizer/v2.1/prebuilt/invoice/syncAnalyze`
```INFO: Traceback (most recent call last):

    line = str(self.fp.readline(_MAXLINE + 1), "iso-8859-1")
